text:
... The pot... Is it here...?
The knife and cutting board...

What's wrong, Chiyoko?
Are you looking for something...?

Oh, no! It's not that!
I'm sorry...!

I was just checking where the utensils are stored...
Just making sure...

Not at all! Not at all!
It's just a coincidence...!

And a good meal is a matter of life and death for the camp!
It would be embarrassing if it didn't turn out well!
─ ...Is there anything I can help with?

I can't find the chopsticks
Could you help me look for them?
